projectsData.techStack: React / Redux / Tailwind CSS / TheMovieDB API
projectsData.assignment: Develop a single-page application to retrieve and display movie data from TheMovieDB API.
keyFeatures: Carousel on the index page showcasing selected movies.
Search form to find movies by title or genre, with highlighted search terms.
Options to sort displayed movies by title or publishing date.
Detailed movie page with reviews displayed in a modal overlay.
Favorite list functionality for adding/removing movies.
Responsive and intuitive user interface for various devices.
technologiesUsed: React: For building the user interface.
Tailwind CSS: For styling and responsive design.
TheMovieDB API: For fetching movie details, reviews, and ratings.
projectsData.myRole: Sole developer responsible for project structure, API calls, UI design, and responsiveness.

images.imgDesc: Displays the search bar and sort dropdown
Reviews modal open on single movie page

projectsData.assignment: Create an e-commerce platform as a collaborative project to enable browsing and purchasing products.
keyFeatures: Product catalog with images, descriptions, and prices.
Shopping cart with a dynamic counter for added items.
Responsive design for a seamless experience on various devices.
technologiesUsed: React DOM: For efficient component rendering.
React Icons: For enhanced UI aesthetics.
Tailwind CSS: For responsive and modern design.
projectsData.myRole: Frontend developer responsible for API integration, shopping cart, and favorites functionalities, as well as responsive layout.

images.imgDesc: Single product page with 2 items in the cart

projectsData.assignment: Develop ChefMate as a group project with UX students to provide personalized AI-generated recipes based on user preferences.
keyFeatures: Personalized recipe suggestions based on mood, time, budget, and allergies.
Recipe and image generation through OpenAI.
User login for saving favorite recipes.
MySQL database integration for secure data storage.
technologiesUsed: OpenAI: For AI-based recipe suggestions and images.
Express: Backend framework for authentication and recipe management.
MySQL: For storing user data and preferences.
Radix UI: For accessible and customizable UI components.
Next.js: For server-side rendering and application performance.
projectsData.myRole: Developer handling OpenAI API integration, recipe storage functionality, and responsive UI design with UX input.

projectsData.techStack: HTML / CSS / JavaScript / Tailwind CSS / Vite
projectsData.assignment: Develop an individual project to create a landing page for the school, showcasing programs, events, and contact information.
keyFeatures: Responsive navigation menu with smooth transitions.
Upgraded design using Tailwind CSS and Vite.
technologiesUsed: HTML and CSS: For structuring and styling the content.
JavaScript: For interactivity like the hamburger menu and scroll effects.
Vite: For a faster development experience.
projectsData.myRole: Sole developer for both versions of the landing page, ensuring responsive design and smooth navigation.

projectsData.assignment:
Assignment:
Practice using state in React building a clock/timer.
Quiz using Next.js and Context for global state management.
